name: Pair The Objects - A new Addictive Mind Game
name_original: Pair The Objects - A new Addictive Mind Game
description:
Are you ready to boost and sharpen your memory skills?

****The BEST ADDICTIVE MIND GAME EVER****
************Download now************

Try your hands on this NEW PUZZLE App – Pair The Objects and test for yourself.

Match the right pair and complete the level with interesting, fiery, tricky designs. Just remember what you have tapped or selected before you match the right pair. Time to sharpen your skills across 100+ challenging levels with many added new features, confusing designs along the way.


Why you will love playing Pair The Objects:
• “Full of fun to Play!”
• “MATCH the right pair and complete the levels”
• “ADVENTUROUS 100+ Levels”
• “ENJOY stunning design & comfy game music”
• “HOURLY free LIFE added”

Already a fan of PTO? Like us on Facebook and stay updated!!
